name: Teddy Bear
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="teddyGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(220,180,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(170,130,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="200" r="80" fill="url(#teddyGrad)" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="350" r="100" fill="url(#teddyGrad)" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="220" cy="180" r="10" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="292" cy="180" r="10" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 230 220 Q 256 250, 282 220" stroke="#8B0000" stroke-width="5" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

name: Building Block (Cube)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="blockGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,100,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,50,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="blockTopGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,150,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,100,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <polygon points="100,200 400,200 400,400 100,400" fill="url(#blockGrad)" stroke="#2C2C9C" stroke-width="5" />
  <polygon points="100,200 400,200 300,100 0,100" fill="url(#blockTopGrad)" stroke="#2C2C9C" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 100 200 L 0 100" stroke="#2C2C9C" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 400 200 L 300 100" stroke="#2C2C9C" stroke-width="5" />
</svg>

name: Bedside Lamp
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="lampShadeGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,200);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,150);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="lampBaseGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,150,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 150 150 L 362 150 L 400 300 L 112 300 Z" fill="url(#lampShadeGrad)" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="231" y="300" width="50" height="150" fill="url(#lampBaseGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#666666" stroke-width="5" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="450" rx="80" ry="20" fill="url(#lampBaseGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Storybook
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="bookCoverGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,255,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,200,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="bookSpineGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,150,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(20,80,20);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="150" y="150" width="212" height="250" fill="url(#bookCoverGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#2C9C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="150" y="150" width="30" height="250" fill="url(#bookSpineGrad)" />
  <path d="M 180 160 L 350 160" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="3" />
  <path d="M 180 390 L 350 390" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="3" />
</svg>

name: Toy Robot
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="robotBodyGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,200,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,150,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="robotHeadGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="200" y="200" width="112" height="150" fill="url(#robotBodyGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#5C7C9C" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="210" y="150" width="92" height="50" fill="url(#robotHeadGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#9C2C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="210" y="220" width="92" height="20" fill="#FFD700" />
  <rect x="180" y="350" width="20" height="100" fill="url(#robotBodyGrad)" />
  <rect x="312" y="350" width="20" height="100" fill="url(#robotBodyGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Alarm Clock
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="clockGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <linearGradient id="clockFrameGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,150,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="120" fill="url(#clockGrad)" stroke="url(#clockFrameGrad)" stroke-width="20" />
  <path d="M 256 256 L 256 160" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <path d="M 256 256 L 300 280" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <rect x="231" y="100" width="50" height="20" fill="url(#clockFrameGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Red Bouncy Ball
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="ballRedGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <radialGradient id="ballRedShine" cx="30%" cy="30%" r="70%" fx="30%" fy="30%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.8);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="150" fill="url(#ballRedGrad)" stroke="#9C2C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="200" r="50" fill="url(#ballRedShine)" opacity="0.6" />
</svg>

name: Bunny Slippers
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="slipperGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <linearGradient id="slipperSoleGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,180,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,130,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="150" ry="50" fill="url(#slipperSoleGrad)" stroke="#9C7C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 150 300 C 100 200, 400 200, 362 300 Z" fill="url(#slipperGrad)" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="160" cy="250" r="15" fill="url(#slipperGrad)" />
  <circle cx="350" cy="250" r="15" fill="url(#slipperGrad)" />
  <circle cx="160" cy="250" r="5" fill="#FF69B4" />
  <circle cx="350" cy="250" r="5" fill="#FF69B4" />
</svg>

name: Toothbrush
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="brushHandleGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,150,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,100,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="brushHeadGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="231" y="150" width="50" height="300" fill="url(#brushHandleGrad)" rx="20" ry="20" stroke="#2C5C9C" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="231" y="100" width="50" height="50" fill="url(#brushHeadGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 235 110 L 277 110" stroke="#FF69B4" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <path d="M 235 120 L 277 120" stroke="#FF69B4" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

name: School Backpack
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="packGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,255,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,200,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="packShine" cx="30%" cy="30%" r="70%" fx="30%" fy="30%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.4);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="150" y="150" width="212" height="300" fill="url(#packGrad)" rx="20" ry="20" stroke="#2C9C5C" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="170" y="170" width="172" height="100" fill="url(#packGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#2C9C5C" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 180 150 Q 256 100, 332 150" stroke="url(#packGrad)" stroke-width="10" fill="none" />
  <path d="M 150 150 L 362 150 L 362 450 L 150 450 Z" fill="url(#packShine)" opacity="0.4" />
</svg>

name: Toy Car
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="toyCarGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,200,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,150,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="toyWheelGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(10,10,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="100" y="300" width="312" height="100" fill="url(#toyCarGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#9C7C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="250" y="250" width="162" height="50" fill="url(#toyCarGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#9C7C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="400" r="30" fill="url(#toyWheelGrad)" />
  <circle cx="360" cy="400" r="30" fill="url(#toyWheelGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Box of Crayons
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="boxGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="crayonTipGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,255,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,200,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="150" y="200" width="212" height="200" fill="url(#boxGrad)" stroke="#9C2C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="170" y="100" width="20" height="150" fill="url(#crayonTipGrad)" />
  <rect x="210" y="100" width="20" height="150" fill="url(#crayonTipGrad)" />
  <rect x="250" y="100" width="20" height="150" fill="url(#crayonTipGrad)" />
  <rect x="290" y="100" width="20" height="150" fill="url(#crayonTipGrad)" />
  <rect x="330" y="100" width="20" height="150" fill="url(#crayonTipGrad)" />
</svg>
